content.rendered:
Richard “Crutch” Crutchfield

Principal Software Systems Engineer

Richard “Crutch” Crutchfield brings over 40 years of Software Systems Engineering expertise. He has led teams at SAIC, NASA, Lockheed, and MITRE to deliver large scale software systems. 

Contact Me
